channel.title: 60 Knobs from Bastl Instruments
channel.description:
Bastl's 60 Knobs controller is out as a DIY kit. Looks like a good candidate for an Axo controller/enclosure with a bit of modding. The device has a microcontroller with software editor and holds 5 presets. Make a patch in Axoloti, assign CC's, Get the blank case files and label them along with your patch, mod the enclosure to hold your Axo and wire it up internally over Midi and Wallah!
http://www.bastl-instruments.com/instruments/sixtyknobs/

item.title: 60 Knobs from Bastl Instruments
item.dc:creator: @reatkiv Jeff
item.description:
@reatkiv wrote:

Anyone built a 60 knobs with Axolotl inside? I'd love to hear how your experience with the results were.

Read full topic

item.title: 60 Knobs from Bastl Instruments
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Has anyone got one of these yet?
Looks like the LXR enclosure would have space for an Axoloti - and the J3 & J4 would allow direct connection for power and midi/serial.
So could then be a standalone axo synth or still a controller - could be a fun Christmas project.

Read full topic
